Bash(MEMORY_PERSIST_PATH=data/memories.json /Users/dro/Library/CloudStorage/GoogleDrive-dro@lynchburgsmiles.com/My Drive/projects/second-brain/venv/bin/python -c "
import asyncio
from app.services.memory_service_new import MemoryService

async def test_persistence():
    # Test with local persistence
    service = MemoryService(persist_path=''data/memories.json'')
    
    # Create and save
    memory = await service.create_memory(
        content=''Persistent memory test'',
        memory_type=''episodic'',
        importance_score=0.7,
        tags=[''persistent'', ''test'']
    )
    print(f''âœ… Created persistent memory: {memory[""id""][:8]}...'')
    
    # Create another service instance to test loading
    service2 = MemoryService(persist_path=''data/memories.json'')
    memories = await service2.list_memories()
    print(f''âœ… Loaded {len(memories)} memories from disk'')
    
    if memories and memories[0][''content''] == ''Persistent memory test'':
        print(''âœ… Persistence verified - memory loaded correctly!'')
    
    print(''\nðŸŽ‰ Persistence test passed!'')

asyncio.run(test_persistence())
")

Bash(USE_SQLITE=true MEMORY_PERSIST_PATH=./data venv/bin/python -c "
import asyncio
from app.services.memory_service_v2 import MemoryServiceV2

async def test():
    # Test with SQLite
    service = MemoryServiceV2()
    stats = await service.get_statistics()
    print(f''ðŸ’¾ Storage backend: {stats[""backend""]}'')
    print(f''ðŸ“Š Total memories: {stats.get(""total_memories"", 0)}'')
    
    # Create a test memory
    memory = await service.create_memory(
        content=''Testing SQLite persistence in v4.1'',
        importance_score=0.9,
        tags=[''sqlite'', ''persistence'', ''v4.1'']
    )
    print(f''âœ… Created memory in SQLite: {memory[""id""][:8]}...'')
    
    # Search using FTS5
    results = await service.search_memories(''SQLite'')
    print(f''ðŸ” Full-text search found {len(results)} results'')
    
    # Get updated stats
    stats = await service.get_statistics()
    print(f''\nðŸ“Š Database stats:'')
    print(f''  - Total memories: {stats.get(""total_memories"", 0)}'')
    print(f''  - Database path: {stats.get(""database_path"", ""N/A"")}'')
    
    print(''\nðŸŽ‰ SQLite backend working perfectly!'')

asyncio.run(test())
")
